entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
